## Introduction
This package is intended for use in processing and visualizing data, including data cleaning via removal of NA values and selection of certain columns and/or rows within a data set. This package is intended for large data sets containing multiple variables. 

## Installation

This package requires the "tidyverse" package. Installation instructions below. 

```{r}

install.packages("tidyverse")

```
